item.title: Taxpayers Shouldn’t Fund the U.N.’s Terrorism Accomplices
item.description: One Republican priority should not fall by the wayside: stripping the U.N. Relief and Works Agency of funding.

item.title: We Are Living in a Comic Book
item.description: Our villains are growing more theatrical while our heroes are shunned.

item.title: Experiencing Siena in Paint, Ivory, Marble, and Gold
item.description: Saint Nick among the stars of the Met’s lovely look at Siena, circa 1300.
